definition[0]: a place you go to or a person you meet when you ask an organization for help
example[0]: Primary health care teams are the first point of contact for users of the service.
definition[1]: a way in which two different things are related
example[1]: finding a point of contact between theory and practice
definition[2]: the part of something where another thing touches it
example[2]: The sting causes swelling at the point of contact.
